name: Poppy Toast (oToastTv)
description:
Poppy Toast is an Action Arcade game about escaping the notorious Razzle HQ and bringing Poppy Toast to the world whilst avoiding Razzle's advanced block defence system. 

Buy it now on Steam!

This game is of course inspired by a familiar flapping bird.

Earn points for every obstacle that you avoid and unlock new toast skins to escape with! The more points you accumulate, the more RGB there is. RGB is love, RGB is life.

Follow me on Twitch and Twitter for more updates.
